Pre-Game Insights: Ramiz Raja questioned Pakistan's performance in the match against Ireland and their preparation for the T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Ramiz Raja expressed concerns over Pakistan's chances to win the World Cup, citing the team's recent performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan will kick off their T20 World Cup campaign against the USA on 6 June in Dallas
